name: DominaTRIX - Hentai Storytelling Puzzle
description:
DominaTRIX is a puzzle game with a unique story about a dominatrix working at a tavern full of minotaurs. Opposite to many other games of the genre, in this one each image doesn't seem to make sense individually but together they create a complete narrative. The Gallery has the complete scenes while the gameplay has a part of them. Enjoy both.

Administrator Mode

Keyboard F: Press it for a few seconds and complete the level

Features

  • Original Story mixed with sexual fetishes;
  • A Powerful Furry Girl;
  • 10 levels with high-quality art;
  • Gallery;
  • No censorship;
  • Steam Achievements;
